chart.name: Reads (Last Hour)
chart.programText:
A = data('counter.cassandra.ClientRequest.Read.Latency.Count', filter=filter('host', 'integration-test-cassandra-2.2-0'), rollup='delta').sum(over='1h').mean().publish(label='A')
B = data('counter.cassandra.ClientRequest.Read.Unavailables.Count', filter=filter('host', 'integration-test-cassandra-2.2-0'), rollup='delta').sum(over='1h').mean().publish(label='B')
C = data('counter.cassandra.ClientRequest.Read.Timeouts.Count', filter=filter('host', 'integration-test-cassandra-2.2-0'), rollup='delta').sum(over='1h').mean().publish(label='C')

C = data('counter.cassandra.ClientRequest.RangeSlice.Timeouts.Count', filter=filter('host', 'integration-test-cassandra-2.2-0'), rollup='delta').sum(over='1h').mean().publish(label='C')

chart.name: Writes/sec

C = data('counter.cassandra.ClientRequest.Write.Timeouts.Count', filter=filter('host', 'integration-test-cassandra-2.2-0'), rollup='rate').mean().publish(label='C')

chart.name: Storage Load and 24h Growth %
chart.programText:
A = data('gauge.cassandra.Storage.Load.Count', filter=filter('host', 'integration-test-cassandra-2.2-0')).publish(label='A')
B = (A).mean(over='1h').publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (B).timeshift('1d').publish(label='C', enable=False)
D = ((B/C - 1) * 100).publish(label='D')

chart.name: Top Nodes by Hints In Progress
Reads/sec
chart.programText:
A = data('counter.cassandra.ClientRequest.Read.Latency.Count', filter=filter('host', 'integration-test-cassandra-2.2-0')).mean().publish(label='A')
B = data('counter.cassandra.ClientRequest.Read.Unavailables.Count', filter=filter('host', 'integration-test-cassandra-2.2-0'), rollup='rate').mean().publish(label='B')
C = data('counter.cassandra.ClientRequest.Read.Timeouts.Count', filter=filter('host', 'integration-test-cassandra-2.2-0'), rollup='rate').mean().publish(label='C')

chart.name: RangeSlices/sec
chart.programText:
A = data('counter.cassandra.ClientRequest.RangeSlice.Latency.Count', filter=filter('host', 'integration-test-cassandra-2.2-0')).mean().publish(label='A')
B = data('counter.cassandra.ClientRequest.RangeSlice.Unavailables.Count', filter=filter('host', 'integration-test-cassandra-2.2-0'), rollup='rate').mean().publish(label='B')
C = data('counter.cassandra.ClientRequest.RangeSlice.Timeouts.Count', filter=filter('host', 'integration-test-cassandra-2.2-0'), rollup='rate').mean().publish(label='C')

chart.name: Total Network Traffic
chart.programText:
F = data('if_octets.rx', filter=filter('sf_hostHasService', 'cassandra') and filter('plugin_instance', 'eth0')).mean(by=['host']).publish(label='F', enable=False)
G = data('if_octets.tx', filter=filter('sf_hostHasService', 'cassandra') and filter('plugin_instance', 'eth0')).mean(by=['host']).publish(label='G', enable=False)
H = (F + G).publish(label='H', enable=False)
A = (H).min().publish(label='A')
B = (H).percentile(pct=10).publish(label='B')
C = (H).percentile(pct=50).publish(label='C')
D = (H).percentile(pct=90).publish(label='D')
E = (H).max().publish(label='E')

chart.name: CPU %
chart.programText:
A = data('cpu.idle', filter=filter('sf_hostHasService', 'cassandra') and filter('plugin_instance', 'cpu-average')).mean(by=['host']).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = (100 - A).publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (B).min().publish(label='C')
D = (B).percentile(pct=10).publish(label='D')
E = (B).percentile(pct=50).publish(label='E')
F = (B).percentile(pct=90).publish(label='F')
G = (B).max().publish(label='G')
